data.text: @democracynow @DavidBarstow @nytimes Truly #fakenews here. Do you idiots believe the tax code hasn’t changed in the past seven decades? Of course it has. It’s incentives and loop holes are legal, specific, and available to be leveraged legally. The Trumps, Rockefeller’s, Getty’s et al have used it. 😷🙄😉
@JohnBSm27831666 @democracynow @DavidBarstow @nytimes Funny how ignorant people think that a failed businessman can "MAGA".

@democracynow @DavidBarstow @nytimes this story has hung over Trump for 30 yrs and has been investigated many times.. and the results of this one will be the same... nothing there there.. and Trump will still be President..MAGA
